title: Bio-Organicos
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican
description: Health food vegetarian restaurant and organic store. Serves dishes like gluten-free pasta, veggie pizza with oat crust. Sells products like quinoa, maca, hemp, lucuma, spirulina, almond milk, basmati rice, gluten free food, sugar-free jam, vegan protein, and more.
streetAddress: 26th St, between 5th and 10th Ave, Fracc. Gonzalo Guerrero
